alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 11:04AM CDT until April 10 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Rock River at Moline affecting Henry IL and Rock Island Counties. Rock River near Joslin affecting Henry IL, Rock Island and Whiteside Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River near Joslin. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.7 feet, Water affects Barstow Road between Barstow and Osborn. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 13.7 feet and steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday evening and continue falling to 10.5 feet by next Friday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
